channel.title: Comments on: Internet People – How to be innovative

item.title: By: Sam Sethi
item.dc:creator: Sam Sethi
item.description:
Indeed Paul the Semantic Web conversation we had before hand was infinitely more enjoyable but like you it was good to see the people you mention above and one or two new entrepreneur faces.
The bloggers dinner in Dublin will be "corking" and well worth attending but I am presenting at MediaTech in London so it is unlikely that I will be in Ireland. ;-(
item.content:encoded:
Indeed Paul the Semantic Web conversation we had before hand was infinitely more enjoyable but like you it was good to see the people you mention above and one or two new entrepreneur faces.

The bloggers dinner in Dublin will be “corking” and well worth attending but I am presenting at MediaTech in London so it is unlikely that I will be in Ireland. ;-(

item.title: By: paul
item.dc:creator: paul
item.description: 2 passing ships in the night! I'll post something on this site before I attend anything in future.
item.content:encoded: 2 passing ships in the night! I’ll post something on this site before I attend anything in future.

item.title: By: Robin Blandford
item.dc:creator: Robin Blandford
item.description: Paul - I don't know how I missed you. I was about to write a post here reporting on the event myself noting there was no other Irish present! I thought I talked to everyone, little did I know!
item.content:encoded: Paul – I don’t know how I missed you. I was about to write a post here reporting on the event myself noting there was no other Irish present! I thought I talked to everyone, little did I know!
